document_title: Blood in the urine (hematuria): Causes, symptoms and diagnosis
subsection_content:
Hematuria is a symptom of most diseases related to organs in the urinary system. Among them, kidney and urethral diseases are the group of diseases that definitely cause bloody urine. In some other diseases such as bladder, blood in urine is a clinical sign of bladder bleeding.
Although hematuria is not a dangerous symptom, most diseases that cause hematuria can be treated with simple medical treatment. But patients need to see a specialist as soon as symptoms appear because prolonged hematuria can lead to blood loss. Furthermore, hematuria also carries a potential risk of cancer that patients need to pay attention to.
